ComicInfo.Title: Commercial; Blue Period; X3; John Lennon; Acherontia Atropos; Untitled (this is the title - MR); The Last Tragic Day of Gori Bau & The Callipygian Sister; And
ComicInfo.Summary:
Commercial: TV viewing leads to surrealism.
Blue Period: An artist gets beaten up in an attempt to reproduce Picasso's painting.
X3: A woman is kidnapped for aliens sexual experimentation.
John Lennon: Lennon goes to Heaven and lightens things up.
Acherontia Atropos: A man thinks he's finding a woman to be in a snuff film but he's the victim.
Untitled (this is the title - MR): Fantasy story.
The Last Tragic Day of Gori Bau & The Callipygian Sister: A brother and two sisters begin incestuous play and the devil takes them.
And: A spacecraft wrecks on a library planet. The survivors find a book that details how to escape the planet.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 01:17:27. [Issue ID 45524]
